abseil-str-cat-append.description:
Description

Flags uses of
absl::StrCat()
to append to a
std::string
. Suggests
absl::StrAppend()
should be used instead.

The extra calls cause unnecessary temporary strings to be constructed. Removing
them makes the code smaller and faster.

a
=
absl
::
StrCat
(
a
,
b
);
// Use absl::StrAppend(&a, b) instead.

Does not diagnose cases where
absl::StrCat()
is used as a template
argument for a functor.
abseil-str-cat-append.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
